# WAACHShelp

[![name status
badge](https://dempz.r-universe.dev/badges/:name)](https://dempz.r-universe.dev/)
[![WAACHShelp status
badge](https://dempz.r-universe.dev/WAACHShelp/badges/version)](https://dempz.r-universe.dev/WAACHShelp)
![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/dempz/WAACHShelp/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)[![Codecov
test
coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/dempz/WAACHShelp/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/dempz/WAACHShelp)
[![Lifecycle:
experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/849158197.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17460007)

General helper functions for the WAACHS linked data project.

## Installation instructions

The package can be installed from the R-universe, by:

    install.packages("WAACHShelp", repos = "https://dempz.r-universe.dev")

Alternatively, the package can be installed using `remotes`:

    remotes::install_github(repo = "dempz/WAACHShelp", build_vignettes = TRUE)

## Accessing vignettes

Vignettes have been built for some of the functions. These can be opened
(using R, for now). The vignettes have the same name as the function.

At the moment, vignettes exist for:

- `icd_morb_flag`
- `create_project`
- `create_markdown`
- `aducust_flag`

Accessing these vignettes can be done two ways:

1.  Using `utils::browseVignettes(package = "WAACHShelp")`
    - Opens vignette via web browser.
2.  Using `vignette(x, package = "WAACHShelp")` where x is the function
    name
    - Opens the vignette in the “Help” tab of RStudio.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_rows2()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/add_rows2.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Add rows to labelled data set.

- [`aducust_flag()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/aducust_flag.md)
  : Custodial data flagging function

- [`check_att()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/check_att.md)
  : Education flagging function

- [`create_markdown()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/create_markdown.md)
  : Create Template for Quarto Markdown

- [`create_project()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/create_project.md)
  : Create a new project structure with extensions

- [`icd_dat`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/icd_dat.md) :
  ICD Classification Data set

- [`icd_morb_flag()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/icd_morb_flag.md)
  : ICD flagging function

- [`person_summary()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/person_summary.md)
  : Summarise a dataframe to a person level

- [`proc_contents()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/proc_contents.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Compile metadata from dataframe

- [`proc_freq()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/proc_freq.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : HTML summary table

- [`save_waachs()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/save_waachs.md)
  : Save dataframe

- [`sum_tab()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/sum_tab.md)
  : Summary tabling function

- [`sumfun()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/sumfun.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Summary function reminiscent of Stata's "tabset".

- [`theme_waachs()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/theme_waachs.md)
  : Apply WAACHS theme to ggplot2 plots

- [`transpose_tblsum()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/transpose_tblsum.md)
  :

  WAACHS transpose
  [`gtsummary::tbl_summary`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_summary.html)
  table

- [`twoway()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/twoway.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : HTML summary table

- [`val_filt()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/val_filt.md)
  : Basic ICD code function

- [`waachs_palette()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/waachs_palette.md)
  : WAACHS colour palette

- [`waachs_table()`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/waachs_table.md)
  : WAACHS table formatting function.

  \`aducust_flag\`](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/aducust_flag.md):

  document](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/create_markdown.md):

  project](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/create_project.md):

  practice](https://dempz.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/icd_morb_flag.md):
